attributes.additional_details:
The draft law, agreed by the German cabinet, has been drawn up to protect minors, especially for girls, by annulling foreign marriages involving underage children. 
As a country which stands by our laws on legal age for marriage we should follow the same path to protect all children below 16 in this country.
attributes.background: Germany’s has agreed a new draft law banning child marriages after the recent refugee influx saw brides even younger than 14 arrive in the country.
